Label.text: We are continuously looking for new contributors to our project. This includes the following fields:

Label.name: text
Label.text: Visit our IRC channel #unknown-horizons on FreeNode to get in touch with the developers and we will be happy to answer all your questions!

Label.name: text
Label.text: You find information on how to get started at

Label.name: text
Label.text: Most developers are from Europe, so make sure to show a little patience. We read our channel logs and will always come back to you.

Label.name: text03
Label.text: Thanks for your contributions and see you soon!

Label.name: text
Label.text: We were accepted to be a mentoring organization for this year's Google Summer of Code.

Label.name: text
Label.text: This means that if you are a student and would like to work on improving Unknown Horizons together with us, Google might even grant you a stipend to do this!

Label.name: text
Label.text: So what do you need? Only make sure to apply in time, following the instructions on our Ideas page linked below.

Label.name: text
Label.text: You find anything important for interested students there, including possible ideas to work on.

Label.name: text
Label.text: The topics we came up with include implementing combat and AI players, but we also have easier tasks if you feel these are too tough. You can of course also propose own ideas!

Label.name: text04
Label.text: We look forward to your application and hope you have fun working with us this summer!
